name: Sofab_Josie_Azure_3-seat_Sofa
reviews: I was SO worried about buying a "couch in a box" but to my surprise the couch was a beauty! One thing to keep in mind is that this couch is MADE IN THE USA! I have found that furniture made in the USA is sturdier and lasts longer. It was very easy to put together. Just a few simple steps. I was able to do it alone in 45 minutes, but the instructions stated it should take two people only 20 minutes. The material is very nice, and looks just as the photos do. The cushions puffed right up. I am so happy =)
description: The Sofab Josie azure 3-seat sofa brings style and comfort to any room. The Josie sofa features plush chenille fabric in a rich blue color and two (2) sets of reversible accent toss pillows.Dimensions: 37 inches high x 88.5 inches wide x 36 inches deepFurniture Pattern: SolidType: SofaMaterial: Chenille, Fabric, Foam, Poly Synthetic Fiber, Polyester Blend, Upholstered, WoodStyle: Casual, TransitionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredExact Color: BlueColor: BlueStyleCasual, TransitionalMaterialFabric, Foam, Poly Synthetic Fiber, Polyester Blend, WoodTypeSofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBlueFurniture PatternSolid
